title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Harpers Ferry Virtual Tour   55 Photos  A virtual tour of Harpers Ferry Park          John Brown Fort   6 Photos  Historical and present day images of John Brown's Fort          Jefferson Rock   3 Photos  Views of and from Jefferson Rock            Lower Town   4 Photos  Scenes of Lower Town Harpers Ferry Park.          Capt. Flagg's US Quartermaster City: Approach of Peace 1864 Event   27 Photos  Photos taken at Capt. Flagg's US Quartermaster City: Approach of Peace 1864 Event, Dec 3-4, 2011          Don Redman Heritage Award Recipients   19 Photos  Don Redman Heritage Award Recipients            Meriwether Lewis at Harpers Ferry   12 Photos  Images connected with Lewis at Harpers Ferry          James Burton Drawings   8 Photos  Drawings of James H. Burton          Harpers Ferry Middle School Service Learning   19 Photos  Harpers Ferry Middle School students participated in a service learning project - Of the Student, By the Student, For the Student. These photos were taken while creating the project.            John Brown 150th Commemoration   22 Photos  Photos from the Sesquicentennial of John Brown's Raid Oct 16-18, 2009          Niagara Movement Centennial Commemoration   16 Photos  Images from the 2006 Niagara Movement Centennial Commemoration          White House Ornament 2007   4 Photos  View the ornament created by Jay Mauzy for the 2007 White House tree featuring National Parks
